description: four foliate feet around base, long cylindrical body, terminated by a circular bowl with and egg and dart design around rim; inside bottom of bowl is a circular floral design
dimension: 6 3/4 x 7 5/8 x 7 5/8 in. (17.15 x 19.37 x 19.37 cm) (diameter, at top rim)
markings: silver marks on both exterior base and underside of bowl of bowl\'S rim, undeciphered
title: Compote
